> The diff coverage is `25%`.

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25607?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [26d991f...f762b74](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25607?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

The complex part is guessing what the data type is from the value. This is only a problem when adding a column in the info axis. This PR simply creates float columns and then the dtype is changed when the data is set. This is not ideal but this is what the codes already does for most of the data types. (using loc, you can't create a 'int' column).
